---
title: "Script to plot correllation of daily average temperature and Chicago Crime."
output: html_notebook
---

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
CTratios<-read.csv("CT_ratios.csv")
```

```{r}
na.omit(CTratios)
CTratios2<-na.omit(CTratios)
CTratios2[drop(2:10)]
```

```{r}
ggplot(data=CTratios2,aes(x=brks2,y=V1)) + geom_line(size=1) + scale_x_continuous(breaks=c(-20,-10,0,10,20,30)) + labs(x="Daily average temperature â°C", y="Relative frequency", caption="Adjusted for daily temperature frequency") + theme_light()
```
